originalText.text: Had wait a while for artist but it was definitely worth the wait my sister-in-law got a great and amazing tattoo from fresh definitely go get tatted at  Black Ink on 113...  Oh p.s don't go expecting any of the cast members that you see on TV show you'll be seriously disappointed!

originalText.text: I love your show is my favorite thing one of these days hopefully I get to come and get a tattoo from you all

originalText.text: Horrible! Just Horrible! Beware! I flew from Orlando FL TO NYC to visit family and thought about getting a tattoo.  I called BI to set up an appointment And even sent them pics of the tattoos i wanted Turns out their internet wasn't working which they hadn't inform me about before . I went to the shop anyways because i was only in town for 4 days I told them i wanted sleeves it came up to $1,000 +tax they told me i had to pay upfront not even a deposit UPFRONT! I was skeptical but i had no problem I just want what i came there for and that was probably a policy because the show. Next thing the lady wrote on a piece of paper and handed to me she said it was my receipt because their register wasn't working.  First the internet Now the register!??? I should've left. Next thing I know, Ted walked into the building and collected the money. and left. I proceeded to the small room where my tats was drawn on & then I was told to leave because they're closing up. I said if that's the case I want my money back and they said the secretary came by to pick it up and there wasn't anything they could do. B.S In disappointment we agreed to reschedule. The next day the studio was closed permanently. I tried to call and No Answer i called the other studio and told management and they said i have to talk to the boss Wednesday @12:00 I did and they said he hadn't showed up. I just wanted my money back and need answers it came to the point that shop blocked my number that was the  last straw i'm filing a law-suit! This is how they treat clients/fans they are NOT even worth it that shop was very dirty and unsanitized with ratchet disrespectful people No wonder everybody who worked there went to jail while working in the studio they are scam artist if you wan't criminals to do your tattoo and want THE money you've earned stolen I  strongly recommend Black ink!!!

originalText.text: Sucks ass why have a shop if it's never open & non of the artist,  you see on tv & want their work is never around or at the shop .  The other guy shop is always open , I think his name is Puma & the Art2Ink shop . His artist is always there & always open Puma & his shop & artist at Art2Ink are great. Forget BlackInk it's About Art2Ink , they always there & great.

originalText.text: Customer service was more than friendly and tattoo artists were able to make an ideas come to life while making it seem like your own.
